history.subtitle: Our Story
history.title: About ANTLIA
history.p1: Inspired by the Antlia constellation, which means “the pump”, we are here as a driving force for innovation in the digital world. This philosophy aligns with our vision and mission: to support global economic growth through technology solutions that are efficient, cost-effective, and environmentally friendly.
history.p2: Through products such as POS, ERP, WMS, TMS, HRM, CRM, IoT, and 3PL, we present an interconnected system to build a transparent, collaborative, and sustainable supply chain. Not only that, Antlia also has services such as Business Operational Consulting, Excel Training, and Workplace Communication Training.
history.p3: As part of Techno King, Antlia is ready to grow with you with technology that is relevant, impactful, and has long-term value.

timeline.subtitle: Our Journey
timeline.title: Our Journey Milestones
timeline.description: ANTLIA's journey in bringing the best technology solutions to Indonesia

milestone1.title: Establishment of ANTLIA
milestone1.description: ANTLIA was founded as an IT consulting company focusing on web application development.

milestone2.title: Service Expansion
milestone2.description: Expanded services to mobile application development and cloud solutions.

milestone3.title: Opening of Regional Office
milestone3.description: Opened the first regional office in Surabaya to serve clients in Eastern Indonesia.

milestone4.title: First Product Launch
milestone4.description: Launched ANTLIA CRM, the first software product for customer relationship management.

milestone5.title: Achievement of 100+ Clients
milestone5.description: Reached a milestone of 100+ clients from various industries across Indonesia.

milestone6.title: Digital Transformation Hub
milestone6.description: Launched the Digital Transformation Hub to support companies on their digital transformation journey.
